name: ESCAPE THE DAM
description:
PLAY THE GAME IN FULL SCREEN MODE!

The evil beavers are building a dam, destroying the natural habitat of the fish.
To get to a new habitat, the fish needs through a treacherous maze filled with wicked crawfishes and delicious seaweed.
Escape the dam before the water runs out!


"Escape the Dam" was developed by Baltic Film, Media and Art School students for their Computer Game course. 
For all four members, this was a first time experience developing a video game.
